name: Jordan Smith
title: Senior Data Analyst
tagline: Turning complex datasets into strategic business decisions through visualization and predictive modeling.

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction
projects.description: Developed a predictive model using Python and Random Forest to identify at-risk customers, allowing the retention team to intervene proactively.

projects.title: Sales Performance Dashboard
projects.description: Automated weekly sales reporting by building a dynamic Tableau dashboard, replacing manual Excel processes and providing real-time visibility.

projects.title: Marketing Attribution Model
projects.description: Designed a multi-touch attribution model to accurately allocate marketing spend across channels, optimizing the $2M annual budget.
